alert.note: Alert for Kerr; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kerr, east central Edwards and northern Real Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Kerr Wildlife Management Area, or 23 miles north of Leakey, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prade Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
